column4: im having a problerm, im trying to install wine 32 bit on my ubuntu 8,04 64 bit, as per the guide here http://wiki.winehq.org/WineOn64bit#head-15ce773b2453307f593a3045e558b30a0e8ed64d
when i get to CC="gcc-4.2 -m32" LDFLAGS="-L/lib32 -L/usr/lib32 -L`pwd`/lib32 -Wl,-rpath,/lib32 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib32" ./configure -v it tells me bash: ./configure: No such file or directory
im a newb and dont really understand what im doing, just following the instructions
I would suggest instead to just download the .deb package file from the wine website
